title: Tests error with upstream GitPython
body:
On our Travis cron build for 0.11.x, the upstream GitPython run [fails with an import error][0].  Locally I've bisected this to GitPython's ce21f63 (Fix setup.py and use of requirements files), but I haven't dug any deeper yet.

```
======================================================================
ERROR: test suite for <module 'datalad' from '/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.5.6/lib/python3.5/site-packages/datalad/__init__.py'>
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.5.6/lib/python3.5/site-packages/git/__init__.py", line 25, in _init_externals
    import gitdb
ImportError: No module named 'gitdb'
During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.5.6/lib/python3.5/site-packages/nose/suite.py", line 210, in run
    self.setUp()
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.5.6/lib/python3.5/site-packages/nose/suite.py", line 293, in setUp
    self.setupContext(ancestor)
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.5.6/lib/python3.5/site-packages/nose/suite.py", line 316, in setupContext
    try_run(context, names)
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.5.6/lib/python3.5/site-packages/nose/util.py", line 471, in try_run
    return func()
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.5.6/lib/python3.5/site-packages/datalad/__init__.py", line 130, in setup_package
    from datalad.support.gitrepo import check_git_configured
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.5.6/lib/python3.5/site-packages/datalad/support/gitrepo.py", line 43, in <module>
    import git as gitpy
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.5.6/lib/python3.5/site-packages/git/__init__.py", line 33, in <module>
    _init_externals()
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.5.6/lib/python3.5/site-packages/git/__init__.py", line 27, in _init_externals
    raise ImportError("'gitdb' could not be found in your PYTHONPATH")
ImportError: 'gitdb' could not be found in your PYTHONPATH
```

[0]: https://travis-ci.org/datalad/datalad/jobs/529418036
